author: cbs8
title: Dennis Rodman to Host Sexy Halloween Party at Sapphire Las Vegas, The Worlds Largest Gentlemens Club on Saturday, October 31st
text:
Guess what Rodman will be wearing as his costume by posting on any social media outlet with #DRinVegas for a chance to win a trip to Sapphire in New York or Free Bottle on Halloween night at Sapphire Las Vegas.
Las Vegas, Nevada (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Flamboyant “Bad Boy” Dennis Rodman will be at Sapphire, "The World’s Largest Gentlemen’s Club", to host the Halloween evening’s events and judge all of the sexy ghouls, sensuous ghosts and bootiful goblins in the Sapphire Halloween Costume Contest. This haunted competition is open to the public for a chance to win a share of thousands of dollars in prizes at Sapphire.
Guess what Rodman will be wearing as his costume by posting on any social media outlet with #DRinVegas for a chance to win a trip to Sapphire in New York or a Free Bottle on Halloween night at Sapphire Las Vegas.
"Sapphire will be the place to be Saturday night! Besides our provocative entertainment lineup, Sapphire will also have over 400 beautiful entertainers available for customer’s entertainment." adds Shai Cohen, Marketing Director.
Night owlsmake plans now to attend this seductively spooktacular Halloween event. Or really get into the “spirit” and reserve the world-famous Rock Star VIP section under the glass stage in the middle of the main room or retreat to one of 10 private Skyboxes overlooking the main floor for a more “intimate” party with your favorite flirtatious entertainer because really, it’s the sexy dancers that’ll put the smile on your face in the first place.
Sapphire, located at 3025 S. Industrial Road in Las Vegas, is the World's Largest Gentlemen's Club with 70,000 square feet of seductive topless entertainment. Get to the club early or reserve a table today. Open 24/7 to patrons 21 and over, Sapphire serves the finest variety of cocktails, wines, champagne and cigars.
Halloween is coming soon, so grab your mask and your broom. Create the best costume ever and get to Sapphire for a monster time. For table reservations call 702.869.0003. And for special offers and updates follow Sapphire LV on twitter @sapphirelv.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13013614.htm
